cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Tag Manager integration enabling marketers to author custom tags that can be embedded in a website channel. It can be used to let marketers add various cookie banners, marketing tags and optimization tools to a website channel. The Xperience Tag Manager supports Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, Microsoft Clarity, VWO, and Intercom as featured tags. It also supports custom HTML snippet tags and custom featured tags authored by developers.

It can be used to let marketers add various cookie banners, marketing tags and optimization tools to a website channel. The Xperience Tag Manager supports Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, Microsoft Clarity, VWO, and Intercom as featured tags. It also supports custom HTML snippet tags and custom featured tags authored by developers.
